mapper.insert: insert into com_serialno (id, prevalue) values (#{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{prevalue, jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert all
into com_serialno (id, prevalue) values (#{item.id, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.prevalue, jdbcType=INTEGER})
select 1 from dual
mapper.delete: delete from com_serialno where 1=1 and id = #{0}
